interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Polish Due nails | Stretchable Real Nail Polish Strips| Gloss Solid Color, Ombre , French, Pattern, Glitter Finish 16Pcs | Incudes Nail Wipe, Nail File, Instructional Brochure (Pink Petals)
Review Date: 2021/07/12
Store: POLISHDUE
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'POLISHDUE', 'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Color': 'Clear,Pink', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.12 x 3.2 x 1.2 inches; 15.84 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are very pretty but very thin. The glue on the back of them is super sticky and a mess to clean off your fingers. I don’t recommend these. I use a different brand that can last up to a week, but these peeked of within about two days. Not all the great to cut and file, either. I was not happy with them, I do not recommend. The color was beautiful though.
Review Title: Very thin.
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
I really enjoyed having something this pretty to put in my hair. You get two of each color, and they are very pretty. I don’t have a lot of hair so they were a bit lose on me. With the pearls on them, they really don’t wrap around too many times and look the same. My daughter put them around her bun in her hair. This accentuated the beauty of the hairpiece, and it worked really well-just an idea for these beautiful hair accessories. They are prettier than the pictures. I’ll be interested to see how long they stay together so I’ll put an update later on how well they last. Very pleased with this product so far, but they are not for people with thin hair.
Really beautifully made
QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
QTMY
['QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White']
{'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 5.51 x 1.69 inches; 4.59 Ounces'}
I love this very much. The colors and the beads are amazing ! It did lose one bead when I first got it so that wasn’t nice but I can put it back on sometime. It is very heavy so it slides a lot and is heavy on the head. I get headaches from heavy things so I just have to wear it for special things. I love it very much.
Very  beautiful.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys aesthetically pleasing hair accessories and nail products that enhance beauty, with an emphasis on unique designs or embellishments like pearls and rhinestones. Recent interactions indicate a willingness to explore beauty products beyond hair accessories. 
- **User Engagement:** Shows interest in durability and performance, demonstrated by a negative experience with a recent nail product that was aesthetically appealing but functionally disappointing. She remains committed to providing feedback on product effectiveness. 
- **Performance Consideration:** Attentive to product weight and comfort, particularly in accessories that have previously caused discomfort. This concern extends to other beauty items, reflecting a desire for practical usability without sacrificing style.
- **Hair Type Consideration:** Recognizes the importance of selecting products suitable for her hair type, particularly avoiding accessories that are less ideal for thin hair. Values versatility in accessories, utilizing them in different styles.
- **Color Variety:** Appreciates variety and personalization in colors across both hair and nail products, leaning toward options that enhance self-expression.
- **Family Orientation:** Engages in shared use of beauty products with family, indicating a preference for multifunctionality and inclusivity in her selections, particularly for herself and her daughter.

Overall, the user prioritizes beauty, functionality, comfort, and shared experiences in her purchases, seeking products that combine aesthetic appeal with practical usability.
